Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-29018 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-29018 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 24.0.9-10, affected by CVE-2024-29018
